mapper.select: select t.EXAM_ID, t.EXAM_NAME, t.EXAM_GRADE, t.STATE from mm_exam t where t.EXAM_GRADE != 'Z' ORDER BY t.EXAM_GRADE
select t.EXAM_ID, t.EXAM_NAME, t.EXAM_GRADE, t.STATE from mm_exam t where t.EXAM_GRADE = 'Z' ORDER BY t.EXAM_ID

select QUES_ID, QUES_LEVEL, QUES_CONTENT, CH_OPTIONA,CH_OPTIONB,CH_OPTIONC,CH_OPTIOND, JU_ANSWER,CH_ANSWER, CASE WHEN t.STATE = '1' THEN '正常' ELSE t.STATE END AS STATE from mm_questions t ORDER BY t.QUES_ID,t.QUES_LEVEL
mapper.insert: insert into mm_questions (QUES_ID, QUES_LEVEL, QUES_CONTENT, CH_OPTIONA,CH_OPTIONB,CH_OPTIONC,CH_OPTIOND, JU_ANSWER,CH_ANSWER, STATE) values (#{quesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quesLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quesContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chOptiona,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chOptionb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chOptionc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chOptiond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{juAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chAnswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
insert into mm_exam (EXAM_ID, EXAM_NAME, EXAM_GRADE, STATE) values (#{examId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{examGrade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select t.EXAM_ID examId, t.EXAM_NAME examName, t.EXAM_GRADE examGrade, t.STATE from mm_exam t where t.EXAM_ID = #{examid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select QUES_ID, QUES_LEVEL, QUES_CONTENT, CH_OPTIONA,CH_OPTIONB,CH_OPTIONC,CH_OPTIOND, JU_ANSWER,CH_ANSWER, t.STATE from mm_questions t WHERE t.QUES_ID IN ( SELECT a.question_id FROM mm_exam_question a WHERE a.exam_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
